  403 N 7th Street
  Sanger, TX 76266

| Mayor/Council Member | Place | Term Expires | First Term Elected |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Thomas E. Muir | Mayor | May 2026 | May 2010 |
| Marissa Barrett | Place 1 | May 2027 | May 2019 |
| Gary Bilyeu | Place 2 | May 2026 | May 2010 |
| Josh Burrus | Place 3 | May 2027 | May 2025 |
| Allen Chick | Place 4 | May 2026 | May 2014 |
| Victor Gann | Place 5 | May 2027 | May 2021 |

The Mayor and City Council are proud to recognize special people, events, and programs that make Sanger a great place to live. Proclamations are formal declarations issued by the Mayor to honor a specific day, week, or month. We take great pride in our community and value the opportunity to honor the groups, organizations, and institutions that make Sanger a place we are proud to call home.

Requests should be submitted to the City Secretaryâ€™s Office at
[citysecretary@sangertexas.org](mailto:citysecretary@sangertexas.org)
with clear details, sample wording, and contact information.

You can review the policy as adopted by
Resolution 2025-15
. Please note, proclamations are not issued for business groundbreakings, ribbon-cuttings, or grand openings. One presentation copy is provided free; additional copies are available upon request.
